CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial;Violation of Article 13 - Right to an effective remedy;Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property
JUDGES: Isabelle Berro-Lefèvre;Karel Jungwiert;Mark Villiger;Mykhaylo Buromenskiy;Peer Lorenzen;Renate Jaeger;Zdravka Kalaydjieva
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in the town of PERSON , GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG awarded the applicant CARDINAL NORP hryvnias ( ORG ) in salary arrears and litigation expenses incurred by the applicant , to be paid by the ORG - controlled enterprise ORG PERSON .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG initiated enforcement proceedings in respect of the judgment given in the applicant 's favour .
CARDINAL . On DATE the company was declared insolvent . The liquidation proceedings instituted against the company are still pending .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant received UAH CARDINAL in part settlement of the judgment debt .
CARDINAL . In their submissions the ORG stated that on DATE the applicant had also received UAH CARDINAL . The applicant did not disagree .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgment of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE ) .
